name: A.I. Feeding Game
description:
You need to feed an AI research program with living creature ! 

Use Arrows Keys to move the drone remote :

LEFT [<] or [>] RIGHT

Use [Z] Key :
- to call and load the drone

Release [Z] to launch your grapple drone

Press [Z] grab a character

Release [Z] over the brain farmer (for more visual accuracy) or the biodigester (for more power)
